This function checks whether an [[/element.md|element]] is streamable as set by [[/setElementStreamable.md|setElementStreamable]] or not.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool isElementStreamable ( element theElement )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{New feature/item|3.0141|1.4.0|6987|{{OOP||[[/element.md|element]]:isStreamable|streamable|setElementStreamable}}}}

===Required Arguments===
* '''theElement''': The [[/element.md|element]] to check the streamability of.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the passed element is streamable like normal, ''false'' if this element must always be streamed in.
